summary: Four stories of love are interwoven on the beautiful, coastal paradise of Saint Tropez.
cast: Jerry Calà|Debora Caprioglio|Serena Grandi|Demetra Hampton|Maurizio Micheli|Alba Parietti|Matteo Ripaldi|Fabrizio Bracconeri|Stéphane Ferrara|Isaac George|Antonio Allocca|Francesco De Rosa|Enzo De Toma|Jimmy il Fenomeno|Rosanna Banfi|Aldo Bergamaschi|Giuseppe Pianviti|Roberto Scarduffa|Gloria Scotti|Alessandra Guarino
keywords: euro trash|trash movie|z movie|breasts|repetition in title

title: Saint Tropez, Saint Tropez
